remixlab.dandelion.branch

Class TrackballAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.core.Agent
      • remixlab.bias.branch.GenericAgent
        • remixlab.bias.branch.GenericMotionAgent
          • remixlab.dandelion.branch.MotionAgent<Constants.DOF1Action>
            • remixlab.dandelion.branch.TrackballAgent

  • public abstract class TrackballAgent
extends MotionAgent<Constants.DOF1Action>
    A MotionAgent<DOF1Action>, such as a trackball, supporting Constants.ClickActions, and Constants.DOF1Actions actions.

    See Also:
    Constants.ClickAction, Constants.DOF1Action

      • setScrollSensitivity

        public void setScrollSensitivity(float sensitivity)
        Defines the scrollSensitivity().

      • scrollSensitivity

        public float scrollSensitivity()
        Returns the x sensitivity.

        Default value is 1. A higher value will make the event more efficient (usually meaning a faster motion). Use a negative value to invert the along x-Axis motion direction.

        See Also:
        MotionAgent.setWheelSensitivity(float)
